You need to apply by phone on behalf of a resident of this country

You cannot apply for a PRC using this online service as you’ve told us the person you’re applying on behalf of lives in an EU country, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway, or Switzerland.

You need to contact us to apply by phone instead..
